text: Seth Adam Meyers (born December 28, 1973) is an American actor, voice actor, screenwriter, producer, television host and comedian. He is best known for hosting NBC's Saturday Night Live news parody segment Weekend Update and the NBC talk show Late Night with Seth Meyers. The latter program premiered on February 24, 2014. Meyers was born in Evanston, Illinois to Hillary and Lawrence Meyers. in 1996 he graduated from Northwestern University. After college he and his brother Josh moved to Amsterdam. They joined a comedy improv group called Boom Chicago. In 2001 he auditioned for producer Lorne Michaels of Saturday Night Live and joined the cast that same year. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Evanston, Illinois Category:Comedians from Evanston, Illinois Category:Writers from Evanston, Illinois Category:Actors from New Hampshire Category:Writers from New Hampshire Category:American stand-up comedians Category:Jewish American actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television personalities Category:Screenwriters from Illinois Category:American movie producers Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New Hampshire
title: Seth Meyers
